Testing the updated [widgetFrame](https://github.com/bhaskarvk/widgetframe) package.

```{r}
library(widgetframe)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(DT)
data(iris)
iris %>% DT::datatable() -> dt

frameWidget(targetWidget = dt, width = "98%", height = "400")
```


```{r}
library(wordcloud2)

wordcloud2(data = demoFreq) -> wc

frameWidget(targetWidget = wc, width = "98%", height = "400")
```


```{r}
library(highcharter)
highcharts_demo() %>% 
  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_chalk()) -> hc

frameWidget(targetWidget = hc, width = "98%", height = "400")
```
